Shradhit Subudhi

Hey, I'm Shradhit Subudhi. I am a computer engineer and graduate student majoring in Data Analytics/ Science - Information Technology at Rutgers University, New Jersey.

I get by as a librarian, front end developer, UI designer, digital publisher, and music enthusiast living in Plymouth, Michigan and working for Michigan Publishing at the University of Michigan Library.

I'm also available for hire as a freelance web developer, designer, or consultant. Drop me a line about your project if you're interested in working with me.
